page.title: 09Brenchley & Matfield School.
page.content: This{C.E.}Primary School built in {1842}had 4 classrooms with open fires, high ceilings and wooden floors.The first new part was built in{1965.}It took{9 years}to finish the library,9 classrooms,hall and office area. The future holds the prospect of ever advancing technology and schools are increasingly making use of computers. The headmaster feels they have a major part to play in{primary education:}as teaching aids, for storing information and its easy retrieval, and as an introduction to program writing. The headmaster with the 8 teaching staff aim to create a{caring family {atmosphere,}based on{Christian {principles.}They recognize that each child is a unique person requiring much attention and personal encouragement,while growing and learning to be a whole person.
